required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Exergaming Session Frequency on Work Performance, Cognition, and Mobility in Adults Age 55 to 65
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Exergaming Session Frequency on Work Performance, Cognition, and Mobility in Adults Age 55 to 65

lead_sponsor.agency: Somogy Megyei Kaposi Mór Teaching Hospital

clinical_study.source: Somogy Megyei Kaposi Mór Teaching Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Aim - determine the immediate and lasting effects of Exergaming frequency on work performance, health, motor, and cognitive function in clerical employees.

detailed_description.textblock: Hypothesis - In sedentary clerical workers the introduction of even 1 session / week exercise can cause lasting and correlated improvements in work, motor, and cognitive function, and effect which plateaus at 2 compared with 3 sessions / week. However, 6 months follow up would show residual effects only at the 3/week frequency in those who had become sedentary again.

primary_outcome.description: Step test (as described by Prieske et al, motion and endurance test)
Grip strength - Chair rise (as part of SPPB) the higher score better performance
Beam walking (4, 8, 12 cm 3 trials each, summed distance score) The longer the journey is, the better the performance
- MMSE (questionnaire…) the higher score better performance
- Processing speed: The Digit Symbol Substitution Test (DSST)
6MWT - The longer the journey is, the better the performance
Fast gait speed over 10 m - speed, the faster the better
Verbal and visual memory span and working memory (0-100 visual analog sclae-the higher score better performance)

arm_group.description: The group does active training for 8 weeks after not training.
The group does active training for 8 weeks after not training.
In the first 8 week-long only control group, The group will do 1 training/week for the next 8 weeks.

intervention.description: virtual training 2 times a week(8 week-long)
virtual training 3 times a week(8 week-long)
In the first 8 week-long only control group. For the next 8 weeks, the control group will do 1 workout per week.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age
- active worker
- no detected neurological status
Exclusion Criteria:
- Sever heart problem
- Sever demeanor
- Alkoholism
- Drug problems

facility.name: Somogy Megyei Kaposi Mór Oktató Kórház

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Somogy Megyei Kaposi Mór Teaching Hospital
